alert.note: Alert for Central Horry; Coastal Horry; Florence; Marion; Northern Horry; Williamsburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 17 at 9:15PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of New Hanover, Pender, southeastern Bladen, Brunswick, Columbus, southeastern Florence, northeastern Georgetown, Horry, south central Marion and eastern Williamsburg Counties through 1000 PM EDT... At 915 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Maple Hill to Exum to near Goretown to near Burgess. Movement was southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wilmington, Myrtle Beach, Conway, North Myrtle Beach, Leland, Oak Island, Carolina Beach, Whiteville, Burgaw, Surfside Beach, Shallotte, Sunset Beach, Wrightsville Beach, Kure Beach, Surf City, Holden Beach, Ocean Isle Beach, Caswell Beach, Bald Head Island and Snows Cut. This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 between mile markers 389 and 416. Interstate 140 US Route 17 in Brunswick County between mile markers 1 and 44. SC Highway 31 between mile markers 5 and 24. SC Highway 22 between mile markers 1 and 26. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight EDT for southeastern North Carolina...and northeastern South Carolina.

area.areaDesc: Central Horry; Coastal Horry; Florence; Marion; Northern Horry; Williamsburg
